title: WATCH | The Cayenne E-Hybrid is the most powerful Porsche SUV yet
text:
Porsche is well-known for models like the 911 and Boxster but the automaker also has a glorified front runner in its SUV segment.

The model in question is the Cayenne, but more specifically, the E-Hybrid version on show here.

Electric power

Boasting a power figure of 500kW from its monstrous 4.0-litre, V8 engine, it is the most powerful production Cayenne that Porsche has to offer. In addition, it also features an electric motor as well.

Review | Why the Porsche Cayenne S is one of the best SUVs in SA

Porsche is well-versed in the art of combining premium aesthetic quality with that of next-generation technology to create a wholesome driving experience.

The Cayenne is a popular choice in South African as one of the most complete luxury SUVs on the market.
description: The Porsche Cayenne E-Hybrid gives you the best of both worlds with a powerful 500kW V8 engine and an environmentally friendly electric motor.
